creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: glazed stoneware tea canister (a) with lid (b) and cup (c) covering top; cyclindrical cannister with narrow foot at bottom and short lipped small opening at top; concentric grooves around mid-body; top half of cannister is glazed dark gray or black and bottom half is unglazed; small round lid/stopper for mouth of cannister with top glazed black; short cylindrical cover or measuring cup is glazed black except for rim
markings: incised on bottom: [jug symbol] / Pond Farm
title: POND FARM Tea Canister
